member.name: T:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcClient
member.summary: This layer is an event driven high-level API with all features you could need for IRC programming.

member.name: M:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcConnection.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes the message queues, read and write thread

member.name: M:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcConnection.Connect(System.String[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Connects to the specified server and port, when the connection fails the next server in the list will be used.
member.param: List of servers to connect to
Portnumber to connect to
member.exception: If there is already an active connection

member.name: M:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcConnection.Connect(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Connects to the specified server and port.
member.param: Server address to connect to
Port number to connect to

member.name: M:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcConnection.Reconnect
member.summary: Reconnects to the server
member.exception: If there was no active connection
If there is already an active connection

member.name: M:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcConnection.Disconnect
member.summary: Disconnects from the server
member.exception: If there was no active connection

member.name: E:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcConnection.OnReadLine
member.event: Raised when a \r\n terminated line is read from the socket

member.name: E:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcConnection.OnWriteLine
member.event: Raised when a \r\n terminated line is written to the socket

member.name: E:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcConnection.OnDisconnecting
member.event: Raised before the connection is closed

member.name: E:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcConnection.OnDisconnected
member.event: Raised when the connection is closed

member.name: E:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcConnection.OnConnectionError
member.event: Raised when the connection got into an error state

member.name: E:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcConnection.OnAutoConnectError
member.event: Raised when the connection got into an error state during auto connect loop

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcConnection.IsConnectionError
member.summary: When a connection error is detected this property will return true

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcConnection.Address
member.summary: Gets the current address of the connection

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcConnection.AddressList
member.summary: Gets the address list of the connection

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcConnection.Port
member.summary: Gets the used port of the connection

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcConnection.AutoReconnect
member.summary: By default nothing is done when the library looses the connection to the server. Default: false
member.value: true, if the library should reconnect on lost connections false, if the library should not take care of it

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcConnection.AutoRetry
member.summary: If the library should retry to connect when the connection fails. Default: false
member.value: true, if the library should retry to connect false, if the library should not retry

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcConnection.AutoRetryDelay
member.summary: Delay between retry attempts in Connect() in seconds. Default: 30

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcConnection.SendDelay
member.summary: To prevent flooding the IRC server, it's required to delay each message, given in milliseconds. Default: 200

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcConnection.IsRegistered
member.summary: On successful registration on the IRC network, this is set to true.

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcConnection.IsConnected
member.summary: On successful connect to the IRC server, this is set to true.

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcConnection.VersionNumber
member.summary: Gets the SmartIrc4net version number

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcConnection.VersionString
member.summary: Gets the full SmartIrc4net version string

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcConnection.Encoding
member.summary: Encoding which is used for reading and writing to the socket Default: encoding of the system

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcConnection.SocketReceiveTimeout
member.summary: Timeout in seconds for receiving data from the socket Default: 600

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcConnection.SocketSendTimeout
member.summary: Timeout in seconds for sending data to the socket Default: 600

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcConnection.IdleWorkerInterval
member.summary: Interval in seconds to run the idle worker Default: 60

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcConnection.PingInterval
member.summary: Interval in seconds to send a PING Default: 60

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcConnection.PingTimeout
member.summary: Timeout in seconds for server response to a PING Default: 600

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcConnection.Lag
member.summary: Latency between client and the server

member.name: M:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcClient.#ctor
member.summary: This class manages the connection server and provides access to all the objects needed to send and receive messages.

member.name: M:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcClient.Connect(System.String[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Connection parameters required to establish an server connection.
member.param: The list of server hostnames.
The TCP port the server listens on.

member.name: M:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcClient.Reconnect(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.param: If the login data should be sent, after successful connect.
If the channels should be rejoined, after successful connect.

member.name: M:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcClient.Reconnect(System.Boolean)
member.param: If the login data should be sent, after successful connect.

member.name: M:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcClient.Login(System.String[],System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Login parameters required identify with server connection
member.remark: Login is used at the beginning of connection to specify the username, hostname and realname of a new user.
member.param: The users list of 'nick' names which may NOT contain spaces
The users 'real' name which may contain space characters

A numeric mode parameter.
Set to 0 to recieve wallops and be invisible. Set to 4 to be invisible and not receive wallops.
The user's machine logon name
The optional password can and MUST be set before any attempt to register the connection is made.

member.name: M:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcClient._Event_RPL_WELCOME(Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcMessageData)
member.summary: Event handler for welcome reply messages
member.remark: Upon success, the client will receive an RPL_WELCOME (for users) or RPL_YOURESERVICE (for services) message indicating that the connection is now registered and known the to the entire IRC network. The reply message MUST contain the full client identifier upon which it was registered.
member.param: Message data containing reply information

member.name: M:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcClient._Event_RPL_TOPIC(Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcMessageData)
member.summary: Event handler for topic reply messages
member.param: Message data containing topic information

member.name: M:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcClient._Event_RPL_NOTOPIC(Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcMessageData)
member.summary: Event handler for topic reply messages == null
member.param: Message data containing topic information

member.summary: Event handler for name reply messages

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcClient.ActiveChannelSyncing
member.summary: Enables/disables the active channel sync feature. Default: false

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcClient.PassiveChannelSyncing
member.summary: Enables/disables the passive channel sync feature. Not implemented yet!

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcClient.CtcpVersion
member.summary: Sets the ctcp version that should be replied on ctcp version request.

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcClient.AutoJoinOnInvite
member.summary: Enables/disables auto joining of channels when invited. Default: false

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcClient.AutoRejoin
member.summary: Enables/disables automatic rejoining of channels when a connection to the server is lost. Default: false

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcClient.AutoRejoinOnKick
member.summary: Enables/disables auto rejoining of channels when kicked. Default: false

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcClient.AutoRelogin
member.summary: Enables/disables auto relogin to the server after a reconnect. Default: false

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcClient.AutoNickHandling
member.summary: Enables/disables auto nick handling on nick collisions Default: true

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcClient.SupportNonRfc
member.summary: Enables/disables support for non rfc features. Default: false

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcClient.Nickname
member.summary: Gets the nickname of us.

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcClient.NicknameList
member.summary: Gets the list of nicknames of us.

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcClient.Realname
member.summary: Gets the supposed real name of us.

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcClient.Username
member.summary: Gets the username for the server.
member.remarks: System username is set by default

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcClient.Usermode
member.summary: Gets the alphanumeric mode mask of us.

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcClient.IUsermode
member.summary: Gets the numeric mode mask of us.

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcClient.IsAway
member.summary: Returns if we are away on this connection

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcClient.Password
member.summary: Gets the password for the server.

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcClient.JoinedChannels
member.summary: Gets the list of channels we are joined.

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcClient.Motd
member.summary: Gets the server message of the day.

member.name: T:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcUser
member.summary: This class manages the user information.
member.remarks:
only used with channel sync
IrcClient.ActiveChannelSyncing

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcUser.Nick
member.summary: Gets or sets the nickname of the user.
member.remarks: Do _not_ set this value, it will break channel sync!

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcUser.Ident
member.summary: Gets or sets the identity (username) of the user which is used by some IRC networks for authentication.
member.remarks: Do _not_ set this value, it will break channel sync!

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcUser.Host
member.summary: Gets or sets the hostname of the user.
member.remarks: Do _not_ set this value, it will break channel sync!

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcUser.Realname
member.summary: Gets or sets the supposed real name of the user.
member.remarks: Do _not_ set this value, it will break channel sync!

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcUser.IsIrcOp
member.summary: Gets or sets the server operator status of the user
member.remarks: Do _not_ set this value, it will break channel sync!

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcUser.IsAway
member.summary: Gets or sets away status of the user
member.remarks: Do _not_ set this value, it will break channel sync!

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcUser.Server
member.summary: Gets or sets the server the user is connected to
member.remarks: Do _not_ set this value, it will break channel sync!

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcUser.HopCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the count of hops between you and the user's server
member.remarks: Do _not_ set this value, it will break channel sync!

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcUser.JoinedChannels
member.summary: Gets the list of channels the user has joined

member.summary: Gets the nickname of the user

member.summary: Gets the identity (username) of the user, which is used by some IRC networks for authentication.

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.ChannelUser.Host
member.summary: Gets the hostname of the user,

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.ChannelUser.Realname
member.summary: Gets the supposed real name of the user.

combined nickname, identity and host of the user that sent the message (nick!ident@host)

member.name: P:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.IrcMessageData.ReplyCode
member.summary: Gets the message reply code

member.name: M:Meebey.SmartIrc4net.Rfc2812.IsValidNickname(System.String)
member.summary:
Checks if the passed nickname is valid according to the RFC
Use with caution, many IRC servers are not conform with this!
